con:config.script: String date = new Date() date = date.replaceAll(":","_") date = date.replaceAll(" ","_") Email_ID = "\"" + date + "@mailinator.com" + "\"" Email_ID = Email_ID.toUpperCase() Email_ID_string = date + "@mailinator.com" Email_ID_string = Email_ID_string.toUpperCase() testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Company_Email_ID", Email_ID) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Company_Email_ID_string", Email_ID_string)
